name: exiftool-action
description: Adds exiftool to the path for use in GitHub Actions

scripts.bundle: pnpm run format:write && pnpm run package
scripts.package: pnpm ncc build src/index.ts -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.preflight: pnpm install && pnpm run format:write && pnpm run lint && pnpm run package

author: daniel maricic <daniel@woss.io>
